# Build

Practical, step-by-step guides for building with Syncular. Start with server and client setup, then explore features as you need them.

> **You are here:** Build (how-to guides).
>
> **Recommended build sequence:** [Server Setup](/docs/build/server-setup) → [Client Setup](/docs/build/client-setup) → [Table Handlers](/docs/build/table-handlers).

Not sure which runtime/dialect to use? Start with [Runtimes](/docs/build/runtimes).

<Cards>
  <Card title="Server Setup" href="/docs/build/server-setup">
    Set up a Syncular server with Postgres and Hono
  </Card>
  <Card title="Client Setup" href="/docs/build/client-setup">
    Configure the React client with SQLite
  </Card>
  <Card title="Service Worker Server" href="/docs/build/service-worker-server">
    Run Syncular server APIs fully in-browser via Service Worker
  </Card>
  <Card title="Table Handlers" href="/docs/build/table-handlers">
    Define how each table syncs and who can access it
  </Card>
  <Card title="CLI" href="/docs/cli">
    Scaffold projects and wire migrations faster
  </Card>
</Cards>
